info.name: ðŸš€ Incubation Management System - COMPLETE API Collection
info.description: Complete, production-ready Postman collection for testing the Incubation Management System API. Includes authentication, all endpoints, test scripts, examples, and comprehensive documentation.

variable.description: Base URL for API endpoints - Change to your deployed URL
JWT token automatically set after login

item.name: ðŸ” AUTHENTICATION - START HERE
item.description: Login with different user roles to test role-based access control

request.description:
**Director Role**: Full system access
- View all teams, projects, reports
- Manage mentors and announcements
- Access comprehensive analytics

**Test Account**: director@university.edu / director123

exec: pm.test("Token saved for future requests", function () {

request.description:
**Manager Role**: Operational management
- Manage assigned teams (CRUD)
- Approve/decline material requests
- Send notifications to teams
- Manage inventory and generate reports

**Test Account**: manager@university.edu / manager123

**Incubator Role**: Team-focused operations
- Manage team members and projects
- Request materials from managers
- View announcements and notifications
- Communicate with mentors

**Test Account**: innovatex@teams.com / team123

**Mentor Role**: Team-specific guidance
- View assigned teams and projects
- Monitor team progress
- Communicate with assigned teams
- Access team-specific analytics

**Test Account**: mentor@university.edu / mentor123

Logout current user and invalidate session

**Response Example:**
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "message": "Logged out successfully"
}
```

item.name: ðŸ‘¥ TEAM MANAGEMENT
item.description: Manage student teams and their members (Manager & Director access)

query.description: Filter by status: active, pending, inactive

request.description:
**Access**: Director, Manager

**Query Parameters**:
- `status`: active, pending, inactive
- `page`: Page number
- `limit`: Items per page
- `search`: Search term

**Response Example:**
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "data": [
    {
      "id": 1,
      "teamName": "InnovateX Team",
      "companyName": "InnovateX Solutions",
      "status": "active",
      "createdAt": "2024-01-01T00:00:00Z"
    }
  ],
  "pagination": {
    "page": 1,
    "limit": 10,
    "total": 5,
    "pages": 1
  }
}
```

Filter by status: active, pending, completed, on_hold

```json
      "status": "active",
      "progress": 75,
      "teamId": 1,
      "createdAt": "2024-01-01T00:00:00Z"
    }
  ],
  "pagination": {
    "page": 1,
    "limit": 10,
    "total": 5,
    "pages": 1
  }
}
```

exec: // Store first project ID for other tests

request.description:
**Access**: Incubator (own team only)

**Categories**: Technology, Agriculture, Health, Education, Design

**Request Body**:
```json
{
  "name": "Project Name",
  "description": "Project description",
  "category": "Technology",
  "status": "active"
}
```

**Response Example:**
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "data": {
    "id": 2,
    "name": "AI-Powered Health Monitor",
    "description": "Wearable device for real-time health monitoring",
    "category": "Health",
    "status": "active",
    "progress": 0,
    "createdAt": "2024-01-01T00:00:00Z"
  }
}
```

**Access**: All roles (based on team assignment)

**Response Example:**
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "data": {
    "id": 1,
    "name": "Smart Campus Energy Saver",
    "description": "AI-powered energy management system",
    "category": "Technology",
    "status": "active",
    "progress": 75,
    "teamId": 1,
    "teamName": "InnovateX Team",
    "files": [
      {
        "id": 1,
        "fileName": "project_plan.pdf",
        "fileType": "application/pdf",
        "fileSize": 2048000,
        "uploadedAt": "2024-01-01T00:00:00Z"
      }
    ],
    "createdAt": "2024-01-01T00:00:00Z",
    "updatedAt": "2024-01-01T12:00:00Z"
  }
}
```

**Access**: Incubator (own team), Manager, Director

**Progress**: 0-100 (integer)
**Statuses**: active, pending, completed, on_hold

**Request Body** (partial update):
```json
{
  "progress": 85,
  "status": "active",
  "description": "Updated description"
}
```

**Response Example:**
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "data": {
    "id": 1,
    "name": "Smart Campus Energy Saver",
    "progress": 85,
    "status": "active",
    "updatedAt": "2024-01-01T12:00:00Z"
  }
}
```

formdata.description: Select one or more files to upload (PDF, DOC, DOCX, JPG, PNG, max 10MB each)

request.description:

```json
      "uploadedAt": "2024-01-01T00:00:00Z"
    }
  ]
```
```json
}
```

exec: // Store first request ID for other tests

request.description:
**Access**: Incubator (own team only)

**Request Body**:
```json
{
  "item_name": "Item Name",
  "description": "Detailed description of why you need this item"
}
```

**Response Example:**
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "data": {
    "id": 2,
    "teamId": 1,
    "itemName": "Laser Cutter Access",
    "description": "Need access to laser cutter for 3 days to prototype our design",
    "status": "pending",
    "requestedAt": "2024-01-01T00:00:00Z"
  }
}
```

**Access**: Manager, Incubator (own team request)

**Response Example:**
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "data": {
    "id": 1,
    "teamId": 1,
    "teamName": "AI Innovators",
    "itemName": "Raspberry Pi Kit",
    "description": "Need Raspberry Pi for IoT project",
    "status": "pending",
    "requestedBy": "John Doe",
    "reviewedBy": null,
    "requestedAt": "2024-01-01T00:00:00Z",
    "reviewedAt": null
  }
}
```

**Access**: Manager Only

**Request Body**:
```json
{
  "status": "approved",
  "notes": "Optional approval notes"
}
```

**Response Example:**
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "data": {
    "id": 1,
    "status": "approved",
    "reviewedBy": "Manager Name",
    "reviewedAt": "2024-01-01T12:00:00Z",
    "notes": "Approved for 3-day access. Please coordinate with lab technician."
  },
  "message": "Request approved successfully"
}
```

**Access**: Manager Only

**Request Body**:
```json
{
  "status": "declined",
  "notes": "Reason for declining the request"
}
```

**Response Example:**
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "data": {
    "id": 1,
    "status": "declined",
    "reviewedBy": "Manager Name",
    "reviewedAt": "2024-01-01T12:00:00Z",
    "notes": "Currently unavailable. Alternative: Use the 3D printer instead."
  },
  "message": "Request declined"
}
```

**Access**: Manager, Incubator (own team request)

**Response Example:**
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "message": "Request deleted successfully"
}
```

formdata.description: Select a file to send (PDF, DOC, JPG, PNG, max 10MB)

request.description:

```json
    "content": "Here's the project document you requested",

    "fileUrl": "https://storage.example.com/files/document.pdf",
    "fileName": "project_plan.pdf",
    "fileSize": 2048000,
    "sentAt": "2024-01-01T12:15:00Z"
  }
}
```

**Note**: Select actual files when testing this endpoint

item.name: Ã°Å¸â€â€ ERROR TESTING
item.description: Test error handling and edge cases

request.description:
**Expected Response**: 400 Bad Request

**Response Example:**
```json
{
  "success": false,
  "error": "Invalid email or password",
  "code": "AUTHENTICATION_FAILED"
}
```

**Expected Response**: 401 Unauthorized

**Response Example:**
```json
{
  "success": false,
  "error": "Authentication required",
  "code": "AUTHENTICATION_REQUIRED"
}
```

**Expected Response**: 404 Not Found

**Response Example:**
```json
{
  "success": false,
  "error": "Team not found",
  "code": "RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND"
}
```

exec: pm.test("Returns resource not found error", function () {

request.description:

```json
}
```

item.name: Ã°Å¸Â¥Â± HEALTH CHECK
item.description: System health monitoring and status checks

request.description:
**Access**: Public (no authentication required)

**Response Example:**
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "status": "healthy",
  "timestamp": "2024-01-01T12:00:00Z",
  "version": "1.0.0",
  "services": {
    "database": "connected",
    "redis": "connected",
    "fileStorage": "available"
  },
  "uptime": "2 days, 4 hours, 30 minutes"
}
```
